00053 #ifdef _WIN32

00055 static LARGE_INTEGER _itstart, _itend;
00056 static LARGE_INTEGER ifreq;
00057 static void itstart(void)
00058 {
00059     static int first = 1;
00060     if (first) {
00061         QueryPerformanceFrequency(&ifreq);
00062         first = 0;
00063     }
00064     QueryPerformanceCounter(&_itstart);
00065 }
00066 static void itend(void)
00067 {
00068     QueryPerformanceCounter(&_itend);
00069 }
00070 double itval(void)
00071 {
00072     return ((double)_itend.QuadPart -
00073             (double)_itstart.QuadPart)/((double)ifreq.QuadPart);
00074 }
00075 #else
00076 #include <sys/time.h>
00077 // intrinsics need better compile flag checking
00078 // #include <xmmintrin.h>
00079 // #include <pmmintrin.h>
00080 // #include <pthread.h>
00081 
00082 static struct timeval _itstart, _itend;
00083 static struct timezone itz;
00084 void itstart(void)
00085 {
00086     gettimeofday(&_itstart, &itz);
00087 }
00088 static void itend(void)
00089 {
00090     gettimeofday(&_itend,&itz);
00091 }
00092 double itval(void)
00093 {
00094     double t1, t2;
00095     t1 =  (double)_itstart.tv_sec + (double)_itstart.tv_usec/(1000*1000);
00096     t2 =  (double)_itend.tv_sec + (double)_itend.tv_usec/(1000*1000);
00097     return t2-t1;
00098 }
00099 #endif

00119 typedef float lfVector[3];
00120 typedef struct fmatrix3x3 {
00121     float m[3][3]; /* 3x3 matrix */
00122     unsigned int c,r; /* column and row number */
00123     int pinned; /* is this vertex allowed to move? */
00124     float n1,n2,n3; /* three normal vectors for collision constrains */
00125     unsigned int vcount; /* vertex count */
00126     unsigned int scount; /* spring count */ 
00127 } fmatrix3x3;

00130 // float[3] vector
00132 /* simple vector code */
00133 /* STATUS: verified */
00134 DO_INLINE void mul_fvector_S(float to[3], float from[3], float scalar)
00135 {
00136     to[0] = from[0] * scalar;
00137     to[1] = from[1] * scalar;
00138     to[2] = from[2] * scalar;
00139 }
00140 /* simple cross product */
00141 /* STATUS: verified */
00142 DO_INLINE void cross_fvector(float to[3], float vectorA[3], float vectorB[3])
00143 {
00144     to[0] = vectorA[1] * vectorB[2] - vectorA[2] * vectorB[1];
00145     to[1] = vectorA[2] * vectorB[0] - vectorA[0] * vectorB[2];
00146     to[2] = vectorA[0] * vectorB[1] - vectorA[1] * vectorB[0];
00147 }
00148 /* simple v^T * v product ("outer product") */
00149 /* STATUS: HAS TO BE verified (*should* work) */
00150 DO_INLINE void mul_fvectorT_fvector(float to[3][3], float vectorA[3], float vectorB[3])
00151 {
00152     mul_fvector_S(to[0], vectorB, vectorA[0]);
00153     mul_fvector_S(to[1], vectorB, vectorA[1]);
00154     mul_fvector_S(to[2], vectorB, vectorA[2]);
00155 }
00156 /* simple v^T * v product with scalar ("outer product") */
00157 /* STATUS: HAS TO BE verified (*should* work) */
00158 DO_INLINE void mul_fvectorT_fvectorS(float to[3][3], float vectorA[3], float vectorB[3], float aS)
00159 {   
00160     mul_fvectorT_fvector(to, vectorA, vectorB);
00161     
00162     mul_fvector_S(to[0], to[0], aS);
00163     mul_fvector_S(to[1], to[1], aS);
00164     mul_fvector_S(to[2], to[2], aS);
00165 }

00186 /* create long vector */
00187 DO_INLINE lfVector *create_lfvector(unsigned int verts)
00188 {
00189     // TODO: check if memory allocation was successfull */
00190     return  (lfVector *)MEM_callocN (verts * sizeof(lfVector), "cloth_implicit_alloc_vector");
00191     // return (lfVector *)cloth_aligned_malloc(&MEMORY_BASE, verts * sizeof(lfVector));
00192 }
00193 /* delete long vector */
00194 DO_INLINE void del_lfvector(float (*fLongVector)[3])
00195 {
00196     if (fLongVector != NULL)
00197     {
00198         MEM_freeN (fLongVector);
00199         // cloth_aligned_free(&MEMORY_BASE, fLongVector);
00200     }
00201 }
00202 /* copy long vector */
00203 DO_INLINE void cp_lfvector(float (*to)[3], float (*from)[3], unsigned int verts)
00204 {
00205     memcpy(to, from, verts * sizeof(lfVector));
00206 }
00207 /* init long vector with float[3] */
00208 DO_INLINE void init_lfvector(float (*fLongVector)[3], float vector[3], unsigned int verts)
00209 {
00210     unsigned int i = 0;
00211     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00212     {
00213         copy_v3_v3(fLongVector[i], vector);
00214     }
00215 }
00216 /* zero long vector with float[3] */
00217 DO_INLINE void zero_lfvector(float (*to)[3], unsigned int verts)
00218 {
00219     memset(to, 0.0f, verts * sizeof(lfVector));
00220 }
00221 /* multiply long vector with scalar*/
00222 DO_INLINE void mul_lfvectorS(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVector)[3], float scalar, unsigned int verts)
00223 {
00224     unsigned int i = 0;
00225 
00226     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00227     {
00228         mul_fvector_S(to[i], fLongVector[i], scalar);
00229     }
00230 }
00231 /* multiply long vector with scalar*/
00232 /* A -= B * float */
00233 DO_INLINE void submul_lfvectorS(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVector)[3], float scalar, unsigned int verts)
00234 {
00235     unsigned int i = 0;
00236     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00237     {
00238         VECSUBMUL(to[i], fLongVector[i], scalar);
00239     }
00240 }
00241 /* dot product for big vector */
00242 DO_INLINE float dot_lfvector(float (*fLongVectorA)[3], float (*fLongVectorB)[3], unsigned int verts)
00243 {
00244     long i = 0;
00245     float temp = 0.0;
00246 // XXX brecht, disabled this for now (first schedule line was already disabled),
00247 // due to non-commutative nature of floating point ops this makes the sim give
00248 // different results each time you run it!
00249 // schedule(guided, 2)
00250 //#pragma omp parallel for reduction(+: temp) if (verts > CLOTH_OPENMP_LIMIT)
00251     for (i = 0; i < (long)verts; i++) {
00252         temp += dot_v3v3(fLongVectorA[i], fLongVectorB[i]);
00253     }
00254     return temp;
00255 }
00256 /* A = B + C  --> for big vector */
00257 DO_INLINE void add_lfvector_lfvector(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVectorA)[3], float (*fLongVectorB)[3], unsigned int verts)
00258 {
00259     unsigned int i = 0;
00260 
00261     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00262     {
00263         VECADD(to[i], fLongVectorA[i], fLongVectorB[i]);
00264     }
00265 
00266 }
00267 /* A = B + C * float --> for big vector */
00268 DO_INLINE void add_lfvector_lfvectorS(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVectorA)[3], float (*fLongVectorB)[3], float bS, unsigned int verts)
00269 {
00270     unsigned int i = 0;
00271 
00272     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00273     {
00274         VECADDS(to[i], fLongVectorA[i], fLongVectorB[i], bS);
00275 
00276     }
00277 }
00278 /* A = B * float + C * float --> for big vector */
00279 DO_INLINE void add_lfvectorS_lfvectorS(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVectorA)[3], float aS, float (*fLongVectorB)[3], float bS, unsigned int verts)
00280 {
00281     unsigned int i = 0;
00282 
00283     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00284     {
00285         VECADDSS(to[i], fLongVectorA[i], aS, fLongVectorB[i], bS);
00286     }
00287 }

00290 {
00291     unsigned int i = 0;
00292     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00293     {
00294         VECSUBS(to[i], fLongVectorA[i], fLongVectorB[i], bS);
00295     }

00299 DO_INLINE void sub_lfvector_lfvector(float (*to)[3], float (*fLongVectorA)[3], float (*fLongVectorB)[3], unsigned int verts)
00300 {
00301     unsigned int i = 0;
00302 
00303     for (i = 0; i < verts; i++)
00304     {
00305         sub_v3_v3v3(to[i], fLongVectorA[i], fLongVectorB[i]);
00306     }

00322 /* copy 3x3 matrix */
00323 DO_INLINE void cp_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float from[3][3])
00324 {
00325     // memcpy(to, from, sizeof (float) * 9);
00326     copy_v3_v3(to[0], from[0]);
00327     copy_v3_v3(to[1], from[1]);
00328     copy_v3_v3(to[2], from[2]);
00329 }
00330 
00331 /* copy 3x3 matrix */
00332 DO_INLINE void initdiag_fmatrixS(float to[3][3], float aS)
00333 {
00334     cp_fmatrix(to, ZERO);
00335     
00336     to[0][0] = aS;
00337     to[1][1] = aS;
00338     to[2][2] = aS;
00339 }
00340 
00341 /* calculate determinant of 3x3 matrix */
00342 DO_INLINE float det_fmatrix(float m[3][3])
00343 {
00344     return  m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[2][2] + m[1][0]*m[2][1]*m[0][2] + m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[2][0] 
00345             -m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[2][1] - m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[2][2] - m[2][0]*m[1][1]*m[0][2];
00346 }
00347 
00348 DO_INLINE void inverse_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float from[3][3])
00349 {
00350     unsigned int i, j;
00351     float d;
00352 
00353     if ((d=det_fmatrix(from))==0)
00354     {
00355         printf("can't build inverse");
00356         exit(0);
00357     }
00358     for (i=0;i<3;i++) 
00359     {
00360         for (j=0;j<3;j++) 
00361         {
00362             int i1=(i+1)%3;
00363             int i2=(i+2)%3;
00364             int j1=(j+1)%3;
00365             int j2=(j+2)%3;
00366             // reverse indexs i&j to take transpose
00367             to[j][i] = (from[i1][j1]*from[i2][j2]-from[i1][j2]*from[i2][j1])/d;
00368             /*
00369             if (i==j)
00370             to[i][j] = 1.0f / from[i][j];
00371             else
00372             to[i][j] = 0;
00373             */
00374         }
00375     }
00376 
00377 }

00379 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied by a scalar */
00380 /* STATUS: verified */
00381 DO_INLINE void mul_fmatrix_S(float matrix[3][3], float scalar)
00382 {
00383     mul_fvector_S(matrix[0], matrix[0],scalar);
00384     mul_fvector_S(matrix[1], matrix[1],scalar);
00385     mul_fvector_S(matrix[2], matrix[2],scalar);
00386 }
00387 
00388 /* a vector multiplied by a 3x3 matrix */
00389 /* STATUS: verified */
00390 DO_INLINE void mul_fvector_fmatrix(float *to, float *from, float matrix[3][3])
00391 {
00392     to[0] = matrix[0][0]*from[0] + matrix[1][0]*from[1] + matrix[2][0]*from[2];
00393     to[1] = matrix[0][1]*from[0] + matrix[1][1]*from[1] + matrix[2][1]*from[2];
00394     to[2] = matrix[0][2]*from[0] + matrix[1][2]*from[1] + matrix[2][2]*from[2];
00395 }
00396 
00397 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied by a vector */
00398 /* STATUS: verified */
00399 DO_INLINE void mul_fmatrix_fvector(float *to, float matrix[3][3], float from[3])
00400 {
00401     to[0] = dot_v3v3(matrix[0],from);
00402     to[1] = dot_v3v3(matrix[1],from);
00403     to[2] = dot_v3v3(matrix[2],from);
00404 }
00405 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied by a 3x3 matrix */
00406 /* STATUS: verified */
00407 DO_INLINE void mul_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00408 {
00409     mul_fvector_fmatrix(to[0], matrixA[0],matrixB);
00410     mul_fvector_fmatrix(to[1], matrixA[1],matrixB);
00411     mul_fvector_fmatrix(to[2], matrixA[2],matrixB);
00412 }
00413 /* 3x3 matrix addition with 3x3 matrix */
00414 DO_INLINE void add_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00415 {
00416     VECADD(to[0], matrixA[0], matrixB[0]);
00417     VECADD(to[1], matrixA[1], matrixB[1]);
00418     VECADD(to[2], matrixA[2], matrixB[2]);
00419 }
00420 /* 3x3 matrix add-addition with 3x3 matrix */
00421 DO_INLINE void addadd_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00422 {
00423     VECADDADD(to[0], matrixA[0], matrixB[0]);
00424     VECADDADD(to[1], matrixA[1], matrixB[1]);
00425     VECADDADD(to[2], matrixA[2], matrixB[2]);
00426 }
00427 /* 3x3 matrix sub-addition with 3x3 matrix */
00428 DO_INLINE void addsub_fmatrixS_fmatrixS(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float aS, float matrixB[3][3], float bS)
00429 {
00430     VECADDSUBSS(to[0], matrixA[0], aS, matrixB[0], bS);
00431     VECADDSUBSS(to[1], matrixA[1], aS, matrixB[1], bS);
00432     VECADDSUBSS(to[2], matrixA[2], aS, matrixB[2], bS);
00433 }
00434 /* A -= B + C (3x3 matrix sub-addition with 3x3 matrix) */
00435 DO_INLINE void subadd_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00436 {
00437     VECSUBADD(to[0], matrixA[0], matrixB[0]);

00441 /* A -= B*x + C*y (3x3 matrix sub-addition with 3x3 matrix) */
00442 DO_INLINE void subadd_fmatrixS_fmatrixS(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float aS, float matrixB[3][3], float bS)
00443 {
00444     VECSUBADDSS(to[0], matrixA[0], aS, matrixB[0], bS);
00445     VECSUBADDSS(to[1], matrixA[1], aS, matrixB[1], bS);
00446     VECSUBADDSS(to[2], matrixA[2], aS, matrixB[2], bS);
00447 }
00448 /* A = B - C (3x3 matrix subtraction with 3x3 matrix) */
00449 DO_INLINE void sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00450 {
00451     sub_v3_v3v3(to[0], matrixA[0], matrixB[0]);
00452     sub_v3_v3v3(to[1], matrixA[1], matrixB[1]);
00453     sub_v3_v3v3(to[2], matrixA[2], matrixB[2]);
00454 }
00455 /* A += B - C (3x3 matrix add-subtraction with 3x3 matrix) */
00456 DO_INLINE void addsub_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00457 {
00458     VECADDSUB(to[0], matrixA[0], matrixB[0]);
00459     VECADDSUB(to[1], matrixA[1], matrixB[1]);
00460     VECADDSUB(to[2], matrixA[2], matrixB[2]);
00461 }
00463 // special functions
00465 /* a vector multiplied and added to/by a 3x3 matrix */
00466 DO_INLINE void muladd_fvector_fmatrix(float to[3], float from[3], float matrix[3][3])
00467 {
00468     to[0] += matrix[0][0]*from[0] + matrix[1][0]*from[1] + matrix[2][0]*from[2];
00469     to[1] += matrix[0][1]*from[0] + matrix[1][1]*from[1] + matrix[2][1]*from[2];
00470     to[2] += matrix[0][2]*from[0] + matrix[1][2]*from[1] + matrix[2][2]*from[2];
00471 }
00472 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied and added  to/by a 3x3 matrix  and added to another 3x3 matrix */
00473 DO_INLINE void muladd_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00474 {
00475     muladd_fvector_fmatrix(to[0], matrixA[0],matrixB);
00476     muladd_fvector_fmatrix(to[1], matrixA[1],matrixB);
00477     muladd_fvector_fmatrix(to[2], matrixA[2],matrixB);
00478 }
00479 /* a vector multiplied and sub'd to/by a 3x3 matrix */
00480 DO_INLINE void mulsub_fvector_fmatrix(float to[3], float from[3], float matrix[3][3])
00481 {
00482     to[0] -= matrix[0][0]*from[0] + matrix[1][0]*from[1] + matrix[2][0]*from[2];
00483     to[1] -= matrix[0][1]*from[0] + matrix[1][1]*from[1] + matrix[2][1]*from[2];
00484     to[2] -= matrix[0][2]*from[0] + matrix[1][2]*from[1] + matrix[2][2]*from[2];
00485 }
00486 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied and sub'd  to/by a 3x3 matrix  and added to another 3x3 matrix */
00487 DO_INLINE void mulsub_fmatrix_fmatrix(float to[3][3], float matrixA[3][3], float matrixB[3][3])
00488 {
00489     mulsub_fvector_fmatrix(to[0], matrixA[0],matrixB);
00490     mulsub_fvector_fmatrix(to[1], matrixA[1],matrixB);
00491     mulsub_fvector_fmatrix(to[2], matrixA[2],matrixB);
00492 }
00493 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied+added by a vector */
00494 /* STATUS: verified */
00495 DO_INLINE void muladd_fmatrix_fvector(float to[3], float matrix[3][3], float from[3])
00496 {
00497     to[0] += dot_v3v3(matrix[0], from);
00498     to[1] += dot_v3v3(matrix[1], from);
00499     to[2] += dot_v3v3(matrix[2], from);
00500 }
00501 /* 3x3 matrix multiplied+sub'ed by a vector */
00502 DO_INLINE void mulsub_fmatrix_fvector(float to[3], float matrix[3][3], float from[3])
00503 {
00504     to[0] -= dot_v3v3(matrix[0], from);
00505     to[1] -= dot_v3v3(matrix[1], from);
00506     to[2] -= dot_v3v3(matrix[2], from);
00507 }

00526 /* create big matrix */
00527 DO_INLINE fmatrix3x3 *create_bfmatrix(unsigned int verts, unsigned int springs)
00528 {
00529     // TODO: check if memory allocation was successfull */
00530     fmatrix3x3 *temp = (fmatrix3x3 *)MEM_callocN (sizeof (fmatrix3x3) * (verts + springs), "cloth_implicit_alloc_matrix");
00531     temp[0].vcount = verts;
00532     temp[0].scount = springs;
00533     return temp;
00534 }
00535 /* delete big matrix */
00536 DO_INLINE void del_bfmatrix(fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00537 {
00538     if (matrix != NULL)
00539     {
00540         MEM_freeN (matrix);
00541     }
00542 }
00543 
00544 /* copy big matrix */
00545 DO_INLINE void cp_bfmatrix(fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from)
00546 {   
00547     // TODO bounds checking 
00548     memcpy(to, from, sizeof(fmatrix3x3) * (from[0].vcount+from[0].scount) );
00549 }
00550 
00551 /* init big matrix */
00552 // slow in parallel
00553 DO_INLINE void init_bfmatrix(fmatrix3x3 *matrix, float m3[3][3])
00554 {
00555     unsigned int i;
00556 
00557     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00558     {       
00559         cp_fmatrix(matrix[i].m, m3); 
00560     }
00561 }
00562 
00563 /* init the diagonal of big matrix */
00564 // slow in parallel
00565 DO_INLINE void initdiag_bfmatrix(fmatrix3x3 *matrix, float m3[3][3])
00566 {
00567     unsigned int i,j;
00568     float tmatrix[3][3] = {{0,0,0},{0,0,0},{0,0,0}};
00569 
00570     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount; i++)
00571     {       
00572         cp_fmatrix(matrix[i].m, m3); 
00573     }
00574     for (j = matrix[0].vcount; j < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; j++)
00575     {
00576         cp_fmatrix(matrix[j].m, tmatrix); 
00577     }
00578 }
00579 
00580 /* multiply big matrix with scalar*/
00581 DO_INLINE void mul_bfmatrix_S(fmatrix3x3 *matrix, float scalar)
00582 {
00583     unsigned int i = 0;
00584     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00585     {
00586         mul_fmatrix_S(matrix[i].m, scalar);
00587     }
00588 }
00589 
00590 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC multiply big matrix with long vector*/
00591 /* STATUS: verified */
00592 DO_INLINE void mul_bfmatrix_lfvector( float (*to)[3], fmatrix3x3 *from, lfVector *fLongVector)
00593 {
00594     unsigned int i = 0;
00595     unsigned int vcount = from[0].vcount;
00596     lfVector *temp = create_lfvector(vcount);
00597     
00598     zero_lfvector(to, vcount);
00599 
00600 #pragma omp parallel sections private(i) if (vcount > CLOTH_OPENMP_LIMIT)
00601     {
00602 #pragma omp section
00603         {
00604             for (i = from[0].vcount; i < from[0].vcount+from[0].scount; i++)
00605             {
00606                 muladd_fmatrix_fvector(to[from[i].c], from[i].m, fLongVector[from[i].r]);
00607             }
00608         }   
00609 #pragma omp section
00610         {
00611             for (i = 0; i < from[0].vcount+from[0].scount; i++)
00612             {
00613                 muladd_fmatrix_fvector(temp[from[i].r], from[i].m, fLongVector[from[i].c]);
00614             }
00615         }
00616     }
00617     add_lfvector_lfvector(to, to, temp, from[0].vcount);
00618     
00619     del_lfvector(temp);
00620     
00621     
00622 }
00623 
00624 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC multiply big matrix with long vector (for diagonal preconditioner) */
00625 /* STATUS: verified */
00626 DO_INLINE void mul_prevfmatrix_lfvector( float (*to)[3], fmatrix3x3 *from, lfVector *fLongVector)
00627 {
00628     unsigned int i = 0;
00629     
00630     for (i = 0; i < from[0].vcount; i++)
00631     {
00632         mul_fmatrix_fvector(to[from[i].r], from[i].m, fLongVector[from[i].c]);
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC add big matrix with big matrix: A = B + C*/
00637 DO_INLINE void add_bfmatrix_bfmatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00638 {
00639     unsigned int i = 0;
00640 
00641     /* process diagonal elements */
00642     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00643     {
00644         add_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[i].m, from[i].m, matrix[i].m);   
00645     }
00646 
00647 }
00648 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC add big matrix with big matrix: A += B + C */
00649 DO_INLINE void addadd_bfmatrix_bfmatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00650 {
00651     unsigned int i = 0;
00652 
00653     /* process diagonal elements */
00654     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00655     {
00656         addadd_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[i].m, from[i].m, matrix[i].m);    
00657     }
00658 
00659 }
00660 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC subadd big matrix with big matrix: A -= B + C */
00661 DO_INLINE void subadd_bfmatrix_bfmatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00662 {
00663     unsigned int i = 0;
00664 
00665     /* process diagonal elements */
00666     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00667     {
00668         subadd_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[i].m, from[i].m, matrix[i].m);    
00669     }
00670 
00671 }
00672 /*  A = B - C (SPARSE SYMMETRIC sub big matrix with big matrix) */
00673 DO_INLINE void sub_bfmatrix_bfmatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00674 {
00675     unsigned int i = 0;
00676 
00677     /* process diagonal elements */
00678     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00679     {
00680         sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[i].m, from[i].m, matrix[i].m);   
00681     }
00682 
00683 }
00684 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC sub big matrix with big matrix S (special constraint matrix with limited entries) */
00685 DO_INLINE void sub_bfmatrix_Smatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00686 {
00687     unsigned int i = 0;
00688 
00689     /* process diagonal elements */
00690     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount; i++)
00691     {
00692         sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[matrix[i].c].m, from[matrix[i].c].m, matrix[i].m);   
00693     }
00694 
00695 }
00696 /* A += B - C (SPARSE SYMMETRIC addsub big matrix with big matrix) */
00697 DO_INLINE void addsub_bfmatrix_bfmatrix( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix)
00698 {
00699     unsigned int i = 0;
00700 
00701     /* process diagonal elements */
00702     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00703     {
00704         addsub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to[i].m, from[i].m, matrix[i].m);    
00705     }
00706 
00707 }
00708 /* SPARSE SYMMETRIC sub big matrix with big matrix*/
00709 /* A -= B * float + C * float --> for big matrix */
00710 /* VERIFIED */
00711 DO_INLINE void subadd_bfmatrixS_bfmatrixS( fmatrix3x3 *to, fmatrix3x3 *from, float aS,  fmatrix3x3 *matrix, float bS)
00712 {
00713     unsigned int i = 0;
00714 
00715     /* process diagonal elements */
00716     for (i = 0; i < matrix[0].vcount+matrix[0].scount; i++)
00717     {
00718         subadd_fmatrixS_fmatrixS(to[i].m, from[i].m, aS, matrix[i].m, bS);  
00719     }
00720 
00721 }
00722 
00724 // simulator start
00726 typedef struct Implicit_Data 
00727 {
00728     lfVector *X, *V, *Xnew, *Vnew, *olddV, *F, *B, *dV, *z;
00729     fmatrix3x3 *A, *dFdV, *dFdX, *S, *P, *Pinv, *bigI, *M; 
00730 } Implicit_Data;
00731 
00732 int implicit_init (Object *UNUSED(ob), ClothModifierData *clmd)
00733 {
00734     unsigned int i = 0;
00735     unsigned int pinned = 0;
00736     Cloth *cloth = NULL;
00737     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
00738     ClothSpring *spring = NULL;
00739     Implicit_Data *id = NULL;
00740     LinkNode *search = NULL;
00741     
00742     if (G.rt > 0)
00743         printf("implicit_init\n");
00744 
00745     // init memory guard
00746     // MEMORY_BASE.first = MEMORY_BASE.last = NULL;
00747 
00748     cloth = (Cloth *)clmd->clothObject;
00749     verts = cloth->verts;
00750 
00751     // create implicit base
00752     id = (Implicit_Data *)MEM_callocN (sizeof(Implicit_Data), "implicit vecmat");
00753     cloth->implicit = id;
00754 
00755     /* process diagonal elements */     
00756     id->A = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00757     id->dFdV = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00758     id->dFdX = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00759     id->S = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, 0);
00760     id->Pinv = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00761     id->P = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00762     id->bigI = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings); // TODO 0 springs
00763     id->M = create_bfmatrix(cloth->numverts, cloth->numsprings);
00764     id->X = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00765     id->Xnew = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00766     id->V = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00767     id->Vnew = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00768     id->olddV = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00769     zero_lfvector(id->olddV, cloth->numverts);
00770     id->F = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00771     id->B = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00772     id->dV = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00773     id->z = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
00774     
00775     for (i=0;i<cloth->numverts;i++) 
00776     {
00777         id->A[i].r = id->A[i].c = id->dFdV[i].r = id->dFdV[i].c = id->dFdX[i].r = id->dFdX[i].c = id->P[i].c = id->P[i].r = id->Pinv[i].c = id->Pinv[i].r = id->bigI[i].c = id->bigI[i].r = id->M[i].r = id->M[i].c = i;
00778 
00779         if (verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED)
00780         {
00781             id->S[pinned].pinned = 1;
00782             id->S[pinned].c = id->S[pinned].r = i;
00783             pinned++;
00784         }
00785         
00786         initdiag_fmatrixS(id->M[i].m, verts[i].mass);
00787     }
00788 
00789     // S is special and needs specific vcount and scount
00790     id->S[0].vcount = pinned; id->S[0].scount = 0;
00791 
00792     // init springs 
00793     search = cloth->springs;
00794     for (i=0;i<cloth->numsprings;i++) 
00795     {
00796         spring = search->link;
00797         
00798         // dFdV_start[i].r = big_I[i].r = big_zero[i].r = 
00799         id->A[i+cloth->numverts].r = id->dFdV[i+cloth->numverts].r = id->dFdX[i+cloth->numverts].r = 
00800                 id->P[i+cloth->numverts].r = id->Pinv[i+cloth->numverts].r = id->bigI[i+cloth->numverts].r = id->M[i+cloth->numverts].r = spring->ij;
00801 
00802         // dFdV_start[i].c = big_I[i].c = big_zero[i].c = 
00803         id->A[i+cloth->numverts].c = id->dFdV[i+cloth->numverts].c = id->dFdX[i+cloth->numverts].c = 
00804                 id->P[i+cloth->numverts].c = id->Pinv[i+cloth->numverts].c = id->bigI[i+cloth->numverts].c = id->M[i+cloth->numverts].c = spring->kl;
00805 
00806         spring->matrix_index = i + cloth->numverts;
00807         
00808         search = search->next;
00809     }
00810     
00811     initdiag_bfmatrix(id->bigI, I);
00812 
00813     for (i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++)
00814     {       
00815         copy_v3_v3(id->X[i], verts[i].x);
00816     }
00817 
00818     return 1;
00819 }
00820 int implicit_free (ClothModifierData *clmd)
00821 {
00822     Implicit_Data *id;
00823     Cloth *cloth;
00824     cloth = (Cloth *)clmd->clothObject;
00825 
00826     if (cloth)
00827     {
00828         id = cloth->implicit;
00829 
00830         if (id)
00831         {
00832             del_bfmatrix(id->A);
00833             del_bfmatrix(id->dFdV);
00834             del_bfmatrix(id->dFdX);
00835             del_bfmatrix(id->S);
00836             del_bfmatrix(id->P);
00837             del_bfmatrix(id->Pinv);
00838             del_bfmatrix(id->bigI);
00839             del_bfmatrix(id->M);
00840 
00841             del_lfvector(id->X);
00842             del_lfvector(id->Xnew);
00843             del_lfvector(id->V);
00844             del_lfvector(id->Vnew);
00845             del_lfvector(id->olddV);
00846             del_lfvector(id->F);
00847             del_lfvector(id->B);
00848             del_lfvector(id->dV);
00849             del_lfvector(id->z);
00850 
00851             MEM_freeN(id);
00852         }
00853     }
00854 
00855     return 1;
00856 }
00857 
00858 DO_INLINE float fb(float length, float L)
00859 {
00860     float x = length/L;
00861     return (-11.541f*pow(x,4)+34.193f*pow(x,3)-39.083f*pow(x,2)+23.116f*x-9.713f);
00862 }
00863 
00864 DO_INLINE float fbderiv(float length, float L)
00865 {
00866     float x = length/L;
00867 
00868     return (-46.164f*pow(x,3)+102.579f*pow(x,2)-78.166f*x+23.116f);
00869 }
00870 
00871 DO_INLINE float fbstar(float length, float L, float kb, float cb)
00872 {
00873     float tempfb = kb * fb(length, L);
00874 
00875     float fbstar = cb * (length - L);
00876     
00877     if (tempfb < fbstar)
00878         return fbstar;
00879     else
00880         return tempfb;      
00881 }
00882 
00883 // function to calculae bending spring force (taken from Choi & Co)
00884 DO_INLINE float fbstar_jacobi(float length, float L, float kb, float cb)
00885 {
00886     float tempfb = kb * fb(length, L);
00887     float fbstar = cb * (length - L);
00888 
00889     if (tempfb < fbstar)
00890     {       
00891         return cb;
00892     }
00893     else
00894     {
00895         return kb * fbderiv(length, L); 
00896     }   
00897 }
00898 
00899 DO_INLINE void filter(lfVector *V, fmatrix3x3 *S)
00900 {
00901     unsigned int i=0;
00902 
00903     for (i=0;i<S[0].vcount;i++)
00904     {
00905         mul_fvector_fmatrix(V[S[i].r], V[S[i].r], S[i].m);
00906     }
00907 }
00908 
00909 static int  cg_filtered(lfVector *ldV, fmatrix3x3 *lA, lfVector *lB, lfVector *z, fmatrix3x3 *S)
00910 {
00911     // Solves for unknown X in equation AX=B
00912     unsigned int conjgrad_loopcount=0, conjgrad_looplimit=100;
00913     float conjgrad_epsilon=0.0001f /* , conjgrad_lasterror=0 */ /* UNUSED */;
00914     lfVector *q, *d, *tmp, *r; 
00915     float s, starget, a, s_prev;
00916     unsigned int numverts = lA[0].vcount;
00917     q = create_lfvector(numverts);
00918     d = create_lfvector(numverts);
00919     tmp = create_lfvector(numverts);
00920     r = create_lfvector(numverts);
00921 
00922     // zero_lfvector(ldV, CLOTHPARTICLES);
00923     filter(ldV, S);
00924 
00925     add_lfvector_lfvector(ldV, ldV, z, numverts);
00926 
00927     // r = B - Mul(tmp,A,X);    // just use B if X known to be zero
00928     cp_lfvector(r, lB, numverts);
00929     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(tmp, lA, ldV);
00930     sub_lfvector_lfvector(r, r, tmp, numverts);
00931 
00932     filter(r,S);
00933 
00934     cp_lfvector(d, r, numverts);
00935 
00936     s = dot_lfvector(r, r, numverts);
00937     starget = s * sqrt(conjgrad_epsilon);
00938 
00939     while (s>starget && conjgrad_loopcount < conjgrad_looplimit)
00940     {   
00941         // Mul(q,A,d); // q = A*d;
00942         mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(q, lA, d);
00943 
00944         filter(q,S);
00945 
00946         a = s/dot_lfvector(d, q, numverts);
00947 
00948         // X = X + d*a;
00949         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(ldV, ldV, d, a, numverts);
00950 
00951         // r = r - q*a;
00952         sub_lfvector_lfvectorS(r, r, q, a, numverts);
00953 
00954         s_prev = s;
00955         s = dot_lfvector(r, r, numverts);
00956 
00957         //d = r+d*(s/s_prev);
00958         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(d, r, d, (s/s_prev), numverts);
00959 
00960         filter(d,S);
00961 
00962         conjgrad_loopcount++;
00963     }
00964     /* conjgrad_lasterror = s; */ /* UNUSED */
00965 
00966     del_lfvector(q);
00967     del_lfvector(d);
00968     del_lfvector(tmp);
00969     del_lfvector(r);
00970     // printf("W/O conjgrad_loopcount: %d\n", conjgrad_loopcount);
00971 
00972     return conjgrad_loopcount<conjgrad_looplimit;  // true means we reached desired accuracy in given time - ie stable
00973 }
00974 
00975 // block diagonalizer
00976 DO_INLINE void BuildPPinv(fmatrix3x3 *lA, fmatrix3x3 *P, fmatrix3x3 *Pinv)
00977 {
00978     unsigned int i = 0;
00979     
00980     // Take only the diagonal blocks of A
00981 // #pragma omp parallel for private(i) if (lA[0].vcount > CLOTH_OPENMP_LIMIT)
00982     for (i = 0; i<lA[0].vcount; i++)
00983     {
00984         // block diagonalizer
00985         cp_fmatrix(P[i].m, lA[i].m);
00986         inverse_fmatrix(Pinv[i].m, P[i].m);
00987         
00988     }
00989 }
00990 #if 0
00991 /*
00992 // version 1.3
00993 static int cg_filtered_pre(lfVector *dv, fmatrix3x3 *lA, lfVector *lB, lfVector *z, fmatrix3x3 *S, fmatrix3x3 *P, fmatrix3x3 *Pinv)
00994 {
00995     unsigned int numverts = lA[0].vcount, iterations = 0, conjgrad_looplimit=100;
00996     float delta0 = 0, deltaNew = 0, deltaOld = 0, alpha = 0;

00998     lfVector *r = create_lfvector(numverts);

01060 // version 1.4
01061 static int cg_filtered_pre(lfVector *dv, fmatrix3x3 *lA, lfVector *lB, lfVector *z, fmatrix3x3 *S, fmatrix3x3 *P, fmatrix3x3 *Pinv, fmatrix3x3 *bigI)
01062 {
01063     unsigned int numverts = lA[0].vcount, iterations = 0, conjgrad_looplimit=100;
01064     float delta0 = 0, deltaNew = 0, deltaOld = 0, alpha = 0, tol = 0;
01065     lfVector *r = create_lfvector(numverts);
01066     lfVector *p = create_lfvector(numverts);
01067     lfVector *s = create_lfvector(numverts);
01068     lfVector *h = create_lfvector(numverts);
01069     lfVector *bhat = create_lfvector(numverts);
01070     lfVector *btemp = create_lfvector(numverts);
01071     
01072     BuildPPinv(lA, P, Pinv);
01073     
01074     initdiag_bfmatrix(bigI, I);
01075     sub_bfmatrix_Smatrix(bigI, bigI, S);
01076     
01077     // x = Sx_0+(I-S)z
01078     filter(dv, S);
01079     add_lfvector_lfvector(dv, dv, z, numverts);
01080     
01081     // b_hat = S(b-A(I-S)z)
01082     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(r, lA, z);
01083     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(bhat, bigI, r);
01084     sub_lfvector_lfvector(bhat, lB, bhat, numverts);
01085     
01086     // r = S(b-Ax)
01087     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(r, lA, dv);
01088     sub_lfvector_lfvector(r, lB, r, numverts);
01089     filter(r, S);
01090     
01091     // p = SP^-1r
01092     mul_prevfmatrix_lfvector(p, Pinv, r);
01093     filter(p, S);
01094     
01095     // delta0 = bhat^TP^-1bhat
01096     mul_prevfmatrix_lfvector(btemp, Pinv, bhat);
01097     delta0 = dot_lfvector(bhat, btemp, numverts);
01098     
01099     // deltaNew = r^TP
01100     deltaNew = dot_lfvector(r, p, numverts);
01101     
01102     /*
01103     filter(dv, S);
01104     add_lfvector_lfvector(dv, dv, z, numverts);
01105     
01106     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(r, lA, dv);
01107     sub_lfvector_lfvector(r, lB, r, numverts);
01108     filter(r, S);
01109     
01110     mul_prevfmatrix_lfvector(p, Pinv, r);
01111     filter(p, S);
01112     
01113     deltaNew = dot_lfvector(r, p, numverts);
01114     
01115     delta0 = deltaNew * sqrt(conjgrad_epsilon);
01116     */
01117     
01118     // itstart();
01119     
01120     tol = (0.01*0.2);
01121     
01122     while ((deltaNew > delta0*tol*tol) && (iterations < conjgrad_looplimit))
01123     {
01124         iterations++;
01125         
01126         mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(s, lA, p);
01127         filter(s, S);
01128         
01129         alpha = deltaNew / dot_lfvector(p, s, numverts);
01130         
01131         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(dv, dv, p, alpha, numverts);
01132         
01133         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(r, r, s, -alpha, numverts);
01134         
01135         mul_prevfmatrix_lfvector(h, Pinv, r);
01136         filter(h, S);
01137         
01138         deltaOld = deltaNew;
01139         
01140         deltaNew = dot_lfvector(r, h, numverts);
01141         
01142         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(p, h, p, deltaNew / deltaOld, numverts);
01143         
01144         filter(p, S);
01145         
01146     }
01147     
01148     // itend();
01149     // printf("cg_filtered_pre time: %f\n", (float)itval());
01150     
01151     del_lfvector(btemp);
01152     del_lfvector(bhat);
01153     del_lfvector(h);
01154     del_lfvector(s);
01155     del_lfvector(p);
01156     del_lfvector(r);
01157     
01158     // printf("iterations: %d\n", iterations);
01159     
01160     return iterations<conjgrad_looplimit;
01161 }
01162 #endif
01163 
01164 // outer product is NOT cross product!!!
01165 DO_INLINE void dfdx_spring_type1(float to[3][3], float extent[3], float length, float L, float dot, float k)
01166 {
01167     // dir is unit length direction, rest is spring's restlength, k is spring constant.
01168     // return  (outerprod(dir,dir)*k + (I - outerprod(dir,dir))*(k - ((k*L)/length)));
01169     float temp[3][3];
01170     float temp1 = k*(1.0 - (L/length)); 
01171     
01172     mul_fvectorT_fvectorS(temp, extent, extent, 1.0 / dot);
01173     sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, I, temp);
01174     mul_fmatrix_S(to, temp1);
01175     
01176     mul_fvectorT_fvectorS(temp, extent, extent, k/ dot);
01177     add_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, to, temp);
01178     
01179     /*
01180     mul_fvectorT_fvector(temp, dir, dir);
01181     sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, I, temp);
01182     mul_fmatrix_S(to, k* (1.0f-(L/length)));
01183     mul_fmatrix_S(temp, k);
01184     add_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, temp, to);
01185     */
01186 }
01187 
01188 DO_INLINE void dfdx_spring_type2(float to[3][3], float dir[3], float length, float L, float k, float cb)
01189 {
01190     // return  outerprod(dir,dir)*fbstar_jacobi(length, L, k, cb);
01191     mul_fvectorT_fvectorS(to, dir, dir, fbstar_jacobi(length, L, k, cb));
01192 }
01193 
01194 DO_INLINE void dfdv_damp(float to[3][3], float dir[3], float damping)
01195 {
01196     // derivative of force wrt velocity.  
01197     mul_fvectorT_fvectorS(to, dir, dir, damping);
01198     
01199 }
01200 
01201 DO_INLINE void dfdx_spring(float to[3][3],  float dir[3],float length,float L,float k)
01202 {
01203     // dir is unit length direction, rest is spring's restlength, k is spring constant.
01204     //return  ( (I-outerprod(dir,dir))*Min(1.0f,rest/length) - I) * -k;
01205     mul_fvectorT_fvector(to, dir, dir);
01206     sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, I, to);
01207 
01208     mul_fmatrix_S(to, (L/length)); 
01209     sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, to, I);
01210     mul_fmatrix_S(to, -k);
01211 }
01212 
01213 // unused atm
01214 DO_INLINE void dfdx_damp(float to[3][3],  float dir[3],float length,const float vel[3],float rest,float damping)
01215 {
01216     // inner spring damping   vel is the relative velocity  of the endpoints.  
01217     //  return (I-outerprod(dir,dir)) * (-damping * -(dot(dir,vel)/Max(length,rest)));
01218     mul_fvectorT_fvector(to, dir, dir);
01219     sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(to, I, to);
01220     mul_fmatrix_S(to,  (-damping * -(dot_v3v3(dir,vel)/MAX2(length,rest))));
01221 
01222 }
01223 
01224 DO_INLINE void cloth_calc_spring_force(ClothModifierData *clmd, ClothSpring *s, lfVector *UNUSED(lF), lfVector *X, lfVector *V, fmatrix3x3 *UNUSED(dFdV), fmatrix3x3 *UNUSED(dFdX), float time)
01225 {
01226     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01227     ClothVertex *verts = cloth->verts;
01228     float extent[3];
01229     float length = 0, dot = 0;
01230     float dir[3] = {0,0,0};
01231     float vel[3];
01232     float k = 0.0f;
01233     float L = s->restlen;
01234     float cb; /* = clmd->sim_parms->structural; */ /*UNUSED*/
01235 
01236     float nullf[3] = {0,0,0};
01237     float stretch_force[3] = {0,0,0};
01238     float bending_force[3] = {0,0,0};
01239     float damping_force[3] = {0,0,0};
01240     float nulldfdx[3][3]={ {0,0,0}, {0,0,0}, {0,0,0}};
01241     
01242     float scaling = 0.0;
01243 
01244     int no_compress = clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_NO_SPRING_COMPRESS;
01245     
01246     copy_v3_v3(s->f, nullf);
01247     cp_fmatrix(s->dfdx, nulldfdx);
01248     cp_fmatrix(s->dfdv, nulldfdx);
01249 
01250     // calculate elonglation
01251     sub_v3_v3v3(extent, X[s->kl], X[s->ij]);
01252     sub_v3_v3v3(vel, V[s->kl], V[s->ij]);
01253     dot = dot_v3v3(extent, extent);
01254     length = sqrt(dot);
01255     
01256     s->flags &= ~CLOTH_SPRING_FLAG_NEEDED;
01257     
01258     if (length > ALMOST_ZERO)
01259     {
01260         /*
01261         if (length>L)
01262         {
01263         if ((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CSIMSETT_FLAG_TEARING_ENABLED) &&
01264             ((((length-L)*100.0f/L) > clmd->sim_parms->maxspringlen))) // cut spring!
01265         {
01266         s->flags |= CSPRING_FLAG_DEACTIVATE;
01267         return;
01268     }
01269     } 
01270         */
01271         mul_fvector_S(dir, extent, 1.0f/length);
01272     }
01273     else    
01274     {
01275         mul_fvector_S(dir, extent, 0.0f);
01276     }
01277     
01278     // calculate force of structural + shear springs
01279     if ((s->type & CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_STRUCTURAL) || (s->type & CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_SHEAR))
01280     {
01281         if (length > L || no_compress)
01282         {
01283             s->flags |= CLOTH_SPRING_FLAG_NEEDED;
01284             
01285             k = clmd->sim_parms->structural;
01286                 
01287             scaling = k + s->stiffness * ABS(clmd->sim_parms->max_struct-k);
01288             
01289             k = scaling / (clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len + FLT_EPSILON);
01290             
01291             // TODO: verify, half verified (couldn't see error)
01292             mul_fvector_S(stretch_force, dir, k*(length-L)); 
01293 
01294             VECADD(s->f, s->f, stretch_force);
01295 
01296             // Ascher & Boxman, p.21: Damping only during elonglation
01297             // something wrong with it...
01298             mul_fvector_S(damping_force, dir, clmd->sim_parms->Cdis * dot_v3v3(vel, dir));
01299             VECADD(s->f, s->f, damping_force);
01300             
01301             /* VERIFIED */
01302             dfdx_spring(s->dfdx, dir, length, L, k);
01303             
01304             /* VERIFIED */
01305             dfdv_damp(s->dfdv, dir, clmd->sim_parms->Cdis);
01306             
01307         }
01308     }
01309     else if (s->type & CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_GOAL) {
01310         float tvect[3];
01311         
01312         s->flags |= CLOTH_SPRING_FLAG_NEEDED;
01313         
01314         // current_position = xold + t * (newposition - xold)
01315         sub_v3_v3v3(tvect, verts[s->ij].xconst, verts[s->ij].xold);
01316         mul_fvector_S(tvect, tvect, time);
01317         VECADD(tvect, tvect, verts[s->ij].xold);
01318 
01319         sub_v3_v3v3(extent, X[s->ij], tvect);
01320         
01321         // SEE MSG BELOW (these are UNUSED)
01322         // dot = dot_v3v3(extent, extent);
01323         // length = sqrt(dot);
01324         
01325         k = clmd->sim_parms->goalspring;
01326         
01327         scaling = k + s->stiffness * ABS(clmd->sim_parms->max_struct-k);
01328             
01329         k = verts [s->ij].goal * scaling / (clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len + FLT_EPSILON);
01330         
01331         VECADDS(s->f, s->f, extent, -k);
01332         
01333         mul_fvector_S(damping_force, dir, clmd->sim_parms->goalfrict * 0.01 * dot_v3v3(vel, dir));
01334         VECADD(s->f, s->f, damping_force);
01335         
01336         // HERE IS THE PROBLEM!!!!
01337         // dfdx_spring(s->dfdx, dir, length, 0.0, k);
01338         // dfdv_damp(s->dfdv, dir, MIN2(1.0, (clmd->sim_parms->goalfrict/100.0)));
01339     }
01340     else // calculate force of bending springs
01341     {
01342         if (length < L)
01343         {
01344             s->flags |= CLOTH_SPRING_FLAG_NEEDED;
01345             
01346             k = clmd->sim_parms->bending;   
01347             
01348             scaling = k + s->stiffness * ABS(clmd->sim_parms->max_bend-k);          
01349             cb = k = scaling / (20.0*(clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len + FLT_EPSILON));
01350 
01351             mul_fvector_S(bending_force, dir, fbstar(length, L, k, cb));
01352             VECADD(s->f, s->f, bending_force);
01353 
01354             dfdx_spring_type2(s->dfdx, dir, length,L, k, cb);
01355         }
01356     }
01357 }
01358 
01359 DO_INLINE void cloth_apply_spring_force(ClothModifierData *UNUSED(clmd), ClothSpring *s, lfVector *lF, lfVector *UNUSED(X), lfVector *UNUSED(V), fmatrix3x3 *dFdV, fmatrix3x3 *dFdX)
01360 {
01361     if (s->flags & CLOTH_SPRING_FLAG_NEEDED)
01362     {
01363         if (!(s->type & CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_BENDING))
01364         {
01365             sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdV[s->ij].m, dFdV[s->ij].m, s->dfdv);
01366             sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdV[s->kl].m, dFdV[s->kl].m, s->dfdv);
01367             add_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdV[s->matrix_index].m, dFdV[s->matrix_index].m, s->dfdv); 
01368         }
01369 
01370         VECADD(lF[s->ij], lF[s->ij], s->f);
01371         
01372         if (!(s->type & CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_GOAL))
01373             sub_v3_v3v3(lF[s->kl], lF[s->kl], s->f);
01374         
01375         sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdX[s->kl].m, dFdX[s->kl].m, s->dfdx);
01376         sub_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdX[s->ij].m, dFdX[s->ij].m, s->dfdx);
01377         add_fmatrix_fmatrix(dFdX[s->matrix_index].m, dFdX[s->matrix_index].m, s->dfdx);
01378     }   
01379 }
01380 
01381 
01382 static void CalcFloat( float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float *n)
01383 {
01384     float n1[3],n2[3];
01385 
01386     n1[0]= v1[0]-v2[0];
01387     n2[0]= v2[0]-v3[0];
01388     n1[1]= v1[1]-v2[1];
01389     n2[1]= v2[1]-v3[1];
01390     n1[2]= v1[2]-v2[2];
01391     n2[2]= v2[2]-v3[2];
01392     n[0]= n1[1]*n2[2]-n1[2]*n2[1];
01393     n[1]= n1[2]*n2[0]-n1[0]*n2[2];
01394     n[2]= n1[0]*n2[1]-n1[1]*n2[0];
01395 }
01396 
01397 static void CalcFloat4( float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float *v4, float *n)
01398 {
01399     /* real cross! */
01400     float n1[3],n2[3];
01401 
01402     n1[0]= v1[0]-v3[0];
01403     n1[1]= v1[1]-v3[1];
01404     n1[2]= v1[2]-v3[2];
01405 
01406     n2[0]= v2[0]-v4[0];
01407     n2[1]= v2[1]-v4[1];
01408     n2[2]= v2[2]-v4[2];
01409 
01410     n[0]= n1[1]*n2[2]-n1[2]*n2[1];
01411     n[1]= n1[2]*n2[0]-n1[0]*n2[2];
01412     n[2]= n1[0]*n2[1]-n1[1]*n2[0];
01413 }
01414 
01415 static float calculateVertexWindForce(float wind[3], float vertexnormal[3])  
01416 {
01417     return dot_v3v3(wind, vertexnormal);
01418 }
01419 
01420 typedef struct HairGridVert {
01421     float velocity[3];
01422     float density;
01423 } HairGridVert;
01424 #define HAIR_GRID_INDEX(vec, min, max, axis) (int)((vec[axis] - min[axis]) / (max[axis] - min[axis]) * 9.99f)
01425 /* Smoothing of hair velocities:
01426  * adapted from
01427  *      Volumetric Methods for Simulation and Rendering of Hair
01428  *      by Lena Petrovic, Mark Henne and John Anderson
01429  *      Pixar Technical Memo #06-08, Pixar Animation Studios
01430  */
01431 static void hair_velocity_smoothing(ClothModifierData *clmd, lfVector *lF, lfVector *lX, lfVector *lV, unsigned int numverts)
01432 {
01433     /* TODO: This is an initial implementation and should be made much better in due time.
01434      * What should at least be implemented is a grid size parameter and a smoothing kernel
01435      * for bigger grids.
01436      */
01437 
01438     /* 10x10x10 grid gives nice initial results */
01439     HairGridVert grid[10][10][10];
01440     HairGridVert colg[10][10][10];
01441     ListBase *colliders = get_collider_cache(clmd->scene, NULL, NULL);
01442     ColliderCache *col = NULL;
01443     float gmin[3], gmax[3], density;
01444     /* 2.0f is an experimental value that seems to give good results */
01445     float smoothfac = 2.0f * clmd->sim_parms->velocity_smooth;
01446     float collfac = 2.0f * clmd->sim_parms->collider_friction;
01447     unsigned int    v = 0;
01448     unsigned int    i = 0;
01449     int             j = 0;
01450     int             k = 0;
01451 
01452     INIT_MINMAX(gmin, gmax);
01453 
01454     for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01455         DO_MINMAX(lX[i], gmin, gmax);
01456 
01457     /* initialize grid */
01458     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
01459         for (j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
01460             for (k = 0; k < 10; k++) {
01461                 grid[i][j][k].velocity[0] = 0.0f;
01462                 grid[i][j][k].velocity[1] = 0.0f;
01463                 grid[i][j][k].velocity[2] = 0.0f;
01464                 grid[i][j][k].density = 0.0f;
01465 
01466                 colg[i][j][k].velocity[0] = 0.0f;
01467                 colg[i][j][k].velocity[1] = 0.0f;
01468                 colg[i][j][k].velocity[2] = 0.0f;
01469                 colg[i][j][k].density = 0.0f;
01470             }
01471         }
01472     }
01473 
01474     /* gather velocities & density */
01475     if (smoothfac > 0.0f) for (v = 0; v < numverts; v++) {
01476         i = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 0);
01477         j = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 1);
01478         k = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 2);
01479         if (i < 0 || j < 0 || k < 0 || i > 10 || j >= 10 || k >= 10)
01480             continue;
01481 
01482         grid[i][j][k].velocity[0] += lV[v][0];
01483         grid[i][j][k].velocity[1] += lV[v][1];
01484         grid[i][j][k].velocity[2] += lV[v][2];
01485         grid[i][j][k].density += 1.0f;
01486     }
01487 
01488     /* gather colliders */
01489     if (colliders && collfac > 0.0f) for (col = colliders->first; col; col = col->next)
01490     {
01491         MVert *loc0 = col->collmd->x;
01492         MVert *loc1 = col->collmd->xnew;
01493         float vel[3];
01494 
01495         for (v=0; v<col->collmd->numverts; v++, loc0++, loc1++) {
01496             i = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(loc1->co, gmin, gmax, 0);
01497 
01498             if (i>=0 && i<10) {
01499                 j = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(loc1->co, gmin, gmax, 1);
01500 
01501                 if (j>=0 && j<10) {
01502                     k = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(loc1->co, gmin, gmax, 2);
01503 
01504                     if (k>=0 && k<10) {
01505                         sub_v3_v3v3(vel, loc1->co, loc0->co);
01506 
01507                         colg[i][j][k].velocity[0] += vel[0];
01508                         colg[i][j][k].velocity[1] += vel[1];
01509                         colg[i][j][k].velocity[2] += vel[2];
01510                         colg[i][j][k].density += 1.0;
01511                     }
01512                 }
01513             }
01514         }
01515     }
01516     
01517 
01518     /* divide velocity with density */
01519     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
01520         for (j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
01521             for (k = 0; k < 10; k++) {
01522                 density = grid[i][j][k].density;
01523                 if (density > 0.0f) {
01524                     grid[i][j][k].velocity[0] /= density;
01525                     grid[i][j][k].velocity[1] /= density;
01526                     grid[i][j][k].velocity[2] /= density;
01527                 }
01528 
01529                 density = colg[i][j][k].density;
01530                 if (density > 0.0f) {
01531                     colg[i][j][k].velocity[0] /= density;
01532                     colg[i][j][k].velocity[1] /= density;
01533                     colg[i][j][k].velocity[2] /= density;
01534                 }
01535             }
01536         }
01537     }
01538 
01539     /* calculate forces */
01540     for (v = 0; v < numverts; v++) {
01541         i = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 0);
01542         j = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 1);
01543         k = HAIR_GRID_INDEX(lX[v], gmin, gmax, 2);
01544         if (i < 0 || j < 0 || k < 0 || i > 10 || j >= 10 || k >= 10)
01545             continue;
01546 
01547         lF[v][0] += smoothfac * (grid[i][j][k].velocity[0] - lV[v][0]);
01548         lF[v][1] += smoothfac * (grid[i][j][k].velocity[1] - lV[v][1]);
01549         lF[v][2] += smoothfac * (grid[i][j][k].velocity[2] - lV[v][2]);
01550 
01551         if (colg[i][j][k].density > 0.0f) {
01552             lF[v][0] += collfac * (colg[i][j][k].velocity[0] - lV[v][0]);
01553             lF[v][1] += collfac * (colg[i][j][k].velocity[1] - lV[v][1]);
01554             lF[v][2] += collfac * (colg[i][j][k].velocity[2] - lV[v][2]);
01555         }
01556     }
01557 
01558     free_collider_cache(&colliders);
01559 }
01560 
01561 static void cloth_calc_force(ClothModifierData *clmd, float UNUSED(frame), lfVector *lF, lfVector *lX, lfVector *lV, fmatrix3x3 *dFdV, fmatrix3x3 *dFdX, ListBase *effectors, float time, fmatrix3x3 *M)
01562 {
01563     /* Collect forces and derivatives:  F,dFdX,dFdV */
01564     Cloth       *cloth      = clmd->clothObject;
01565     unsigned int i  = 0;
01566     float       spring_air  = clmd->sim_parms->Cvi * 0.01f; /* viscosity of air scaled in percent */
01567     float       gravity[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01568     float       tm2[3][3]   = {{0}};
01569     MFace       *mfaces     = cloth->mfaces;
01570     unsigned int numverts = cloth->numverts;
01571     LinkNode *search;
01572     lfVector *winvec;
01573     EffectedPoint epoint;
01574 
01575     tm2[0][0]= tm2[1][1]= tm2[2][2]= -spring_air;
01576     
01577     /* global acceleration (gravitation) */
01578     if (clmd->scene->physics_settings.flag & PHYS_GLOBAL_GRAVITY) {
01579         copy_v3_v3(gravity, clmd->scene->physics_settings.gravity);
01580         mul_fvector_S(gravity, gravity, 0.001f * clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights->global_gravity); /* scale gravity force */
01581     }
01582 
01583     /* set dFdX jacobi matrix to zero */
01584     init_bfmatrix(dFdX, ZERO);
01585     /* set dFdX jacobi matrix diagonal entries to -spring_air */ 
01586     initdiag_bfmatrix(dFdV, tm2);
01587 
01588     init_lfvector(lF, gravity, numverts);
01589     
01590     if (clmd->sim_parms->velocity_smooth > 0.0f || clmd->sim_parms->collider_friction > 0.0f)
01591         hair_velocity_smoothing(clmd, lF, lX, lV, numverts);
01592 
01593     /* multiply lF with mass matrix
01594      * force = mass * acceleration (in this case: gravity)
01595      */
01596     for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01597     {
01598         float temp[3];
01599         copy_v3_v3(temp, lF[i]);
01600         mul_fmatrix_fvector(lF[i], M[i].m, temp);
01601     }
01602 
01603     submul_lfvectorS(lF, lV, spring_air, numverts);
01604     
01605     /* handle external forces like wind */
01606     if (effectors)
01607     {   
01608         // 0 = force, 1 = normalized force
01609         winvec = create_lfvector(cloth->numverts);
01610         
01611         if (!winvec)
01612             printf("winvec: out of memory in implicit.c\n");
01613         
01614         // precalculate wind forces
01615         for (i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++)
01616         {   
01617             pd_point_from_loc(clmd->scene, (float*)lX[i], (float*)lV[i], i, &epoint);
01618             pdDoEffectors(effectors, NULL, clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights, &epoint, winvec[i], NULL);
01619         }
01620         
01621         for (i = 0; i < cloth->numfaces; i++)
01622         {
01623             float trinormal[3]={0,0,0}; // normalized triangle normal
01624             float triunnormal[3]={0,0,0}; // not-normalized-triangle normal
01625             float tmp[3]={0,0,0};
01626             float factor = (mfaces[i].v4) ? 0.25 : 1.0 / 3.0;
01627             factor *= 0.02;
01628             
01629             // calculate face normal
01630             if (mfaces[i].v4)
01631                 CalcFloat4(lX[mfaces[i].v1],lX[mfaces[i].v2],lX[mfaces[i].v3],lX[mfaces[i].v4],triunnormal);
01632             else
01633                 CalcFloat(lX[mfaces[i].v1],lX[mfaces[i].v2],lX[mfaces[i].v3],triunnormal);
01634 
01635             normalize_v3_v3(trinormal, triunnormal);
01636             
01637             // add wind from v1
01638             copy_v3_v3(tmp, trinormal);
01639             mul_v3_fl(tmp, calculateVertexWindForce(winvec[mfaces[i].v1], triunnormal));
01640             VECADDS(lF[mfaces[i].v1], lF[mfaces[i].v1], tmp, factor);
01641             
01642             // add wind from v2
01643             copy_v3_v3(tmp, trinormal);
01644             mul_v3_fl(tmp, calculateVertexWindForce(winvec[mfaces[i].v2], triunnormal));
01645             VECADDS(lF[mfaces[i].v2], lF[mfaces[i].v2], tmp, factor);
01646             
01647             // add wind from v3
01648             copy_v3_v3(tmp, trinormal);
01649             mul_v3_fl(tmp, calculateVertexWindForce(winvec[mfaces[i].v3], triunnormal));
01650             VECADDS(lF[mfaces[i].v3], lF[mfaces[i].v3], tmp, factor);
01651             
01652             // add wind from v4
01653             if (mfaces[i].v4)
01654             {
01655                 copy_v3_v3(tmp, trinormal);
01656                 mul_v3_fl(tmp, calculateVertexWindForce(winvec[mfaces[i].v4], triunnormal));
01657                 VECADDS(lF[mfaces[i].v4], lF[mfaces[i].v4], tmp, factor);
01658             }
01659         }
01660 
01661         /* Hair has only edges */
01662         if (cloth->numfaces == 0) {
01663             ClothSpring *spring;
01664             float edgevec[3]={0,0,0}; //edge vector
01665             float edgeunnormal[3]={0,0,0}; // not-normalized-edge normal
01666             float tmp[3]={0,0,0};
01667             float factor = 0.01;
01668 
01669             search = cloth->springs;
01670             while (search) {
01671                 spring = search->link;
01672                 
01673                 if (spring->type == CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_STRUCTURAL) {
01674                     sub_v3_v3v3(edgevec, (float*)lX[spring->ij], (float*)lX[spring->kl]);
01675 
01676                     project_v3_v3v3(tmp, winvec[spring->ij], edgevec);
01677                     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeunnormal, winvec[spring->ij], tmp);
01678                     /* hair doesn't stretch too much so we can use restlen pretty safely */
01679                     VECADDS(lF[spring->ij], lF[spring->ij], edgeunnormal, spring->restlen * factor);
01680 
01681                     project_v3_v3v3(tmp, winvec[spring->kl], edgevec);
01682                     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeunnormal, winvec[spring->kl], tmp);
01683                     VECADDS(lF[spring->kl], lF[spring->kl], edgeunnormal, spring->restlen * factor);
01684                 }
01685 
01686                 search = search->next;
01687             }
01688         }
01689 
01690         del_lfvector(winvec);
01691     }
01692         
01693     // calculate spring forces
01694     search = cloth->springs;
01695     while (search)
01696     {
01697         // only handle active springs
01698         // if (((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CSIMSETT_FLAG_TEARING_ENABLED) && !(springs[i].flags & CSPRING_FLAG_DEACTIVATE))|| !(clmd->sim_parms->flags & CSIMSETT_FLAG_TEARING_ENABLED)) {}
01699         cloth_calc_spring_force(clmd, search->link, lF, lX, lV, dFdV, dFdX, time);
01700 
01701         search = search->next;
01702     }
01703     
01704     // apply spring forces
01705     search = cloth->springs;
01706     while (search)
01707     {
01708         // only handle active springs
01709         // if (((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CSIMSETT_FLAG_TEARING_ENABLED) && !(springs[i].flags & CSPRING_FLAG_DEACTIVATE))|| !(clmd->sim_parms->flags & CSIMSETT_FLAG_TEARING_ENABLED)) 
01710         cloth_apply_spring_force(clmd, search->link, lF, lX, lV, dFdV, dFdX);
01711         search = search->next;
01712     }
01713     // printf("\n");
01714 }
01715 
01716 static void simulate_implicit_euler(lfVector *Vnew, lfVector *UNUSED(lX), lfVector *lV, lfVector *lF, fmatrix3x3 *dFdV, fmatrix3x3 *dFdX, float dt, fmatrix3x3 *A, lfVector *B, lfVector *dV, fmatrix3x3 *S, lfVector *z, lfVector *olddV, fmatrix3x3 *UNUSED(P), fmatrix3x3 *UNUSED(Pinv), fmatrix3x3 *M, fmatrix3x3 *UNUSED(bigI))
01717 {
01718     unsigned int numverts = dFdV[0].vcount;
01719 
01720     lfVector *dFdXmV = create_lfvector(numverts);
01721     zero_lfvector(dV, numverts);
01722     
01723     cp_bfmatrix(A, M);
01724     
01725     subadd_bfmatrixS_bfmatrixS(A, dFdV, dt, dFdX, (dt*dt));
01726 
01727     mul_bfmatrix_lfvector(dFdXmV, dFdX, lV);
01728 
01729     add_lfvectorS_lfvectorS(B, lF, dt, dFdXmV, (dt*dt), numverts);
01730     
01731     itstart();
01732     
01733     cg_filtered(dV, A, B, z, S); /* conjugate gradient algorithm to solve Ax=b */
01734     // cg_filtered_pre(dV, A, B, z, S, P, Pinv, bigI);
01735     
01736     itend();
01737     // printf("cg_filtered calc time: %f\n", (float)itval());
01738     
01739     cp_lfvector(olddV, dV, numverts);
01740 
01741     // advance velocities
01742     add_lfvector_lfvector(Vnew, lV, dV, numverts);
01743     
01744 
01745     del_lfvector(dFdXmV);
01746 }
01747 
01748 /* computes where the cloth would be if it were subject to perfectly stiff edges
01749  * (edge distance constraints) in a lagrangian solver.  then add forces to help
01750  * guide the implicit solver to that state.  this function is called after
01751  * collisions*/
01752 int cloth_calc_helper_forces(Object *UNUSED(ob), ClothModifierData * clmd, float (*initial_cos)[3], float UNUSED(step), float dt)
01753 {
01754     Cloth *cloth= clmd->clothObject;
01755     float (*cos)[3] = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*cloth->numverts, "cos cloth_calc_helper_forces");
01756     float *masses = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*cloth->numverts, "cos cloth_calc_helper_forces");
01757     LinkNode *node;
01758     ClothSpring *spring;
01759     ClothVertex *cv;
01760     int i, steps;
01761     
01762     cv = cloth->verts;
01763     for (i=0; i<cloth->numverts; i++, cv++) {
01764         copy_v3_v3(cos[i], cv->tx);
01765         
01766         if (cv->goal == 1.0f || len_v3v3(initial_cos[i], cv->tx) != 0.0) {
01767             masses[i] = 1e+10;  
01768         }
01769         else {
01770             masses[i] = cv->mass;
01771         }
01772     }
01773     
01774     steps = 55;
01775     for (i=0; i<steps; i++) {
01776         for (node=cloth->springs; node; node=node->next) {
01777             /* ClothVertex *cv1, *cv2; */ /* UNUSED */
01778             int v1, v2;
01779             float len, c, l, vec[3];
01780             
01781             spring = node->link;
01782             if (spring->type != CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_STRUCTURAL && spring->type != CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_SHEAR) 
01783                 continue;
01784             
01785             v1 = spring->ij; v2 = spring->kl;
01786             /* cv1 = cloth->verts + v1; */ /* UNUSED */
01787             /* cv2 = cloth->verts + v2; */ /* UNUSED */
01788             len = len_v3v3(cos[v1], cos[v2]);
01789             
01790             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cos[v1], cos[v2]);
01791             normalize_v3(vec);
01792             
01793             c = (len - spring->restlen);
01794             if (c == 0.0)
01795                 continue;
01796             
01797             l = c / ((1.0/masses[v1]) + (1.0/masses[v2]));
01798             
01799             mul_v3_fl(vec, -(1.0/masses[v1])*l);
01800             add_v3_v3(cos[v1], vec);
01801     
01802             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cos[v2], cos[v1]);
01803             normalize_v3(vec);
01804             
01805             mul_v3_fl(vec, -(1.0/masses[v2])*l);
01806             add_v3_v3(cos[v2], vec);
01807         }
01808     }
01809     
01810     cv = cloth->verts;
01811     for (i=0; i<cloth->numverts; i++, cv++) {
01812         float vec[3];
01813         
01814         /*compute forces*/
01815         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cos[i], cv->tx);
01816         mul_v3_fl(vec, cv->mass*dt*20.0f);
01817         add_v3_v3(cv->tv, vec);
01818         //copy_v3_v3(cv->tx, cos[i]);
01819     }
01820     
01821     MEM_freeN(cos);
01822     MEM_freeN(masses);
01823     
01824     return 1;
01825 }
01826 int implicit_solver (Object *ob, float frame, ClothModifierData *clmd, ListBase *effectors)
01827 {
01828     unsigned int i=0;
01829     float step=0.0f, tf=clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
01830     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01831     ClothVertex *verts = cloth->verts, *cv;
01832     unsigned int numverts = cloth->numverts;
01833     float dt = clmd->sim_parms->timescale / clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame;
01834     float spf = (float)clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame / clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
01835     float (*initial_cos)[3] = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*cloth->numverts, "initial_cos implicit.c");
01836     Implicit_Data *id = cloth->implicit;
01837     int do_extra_solve;
01838 
01839     if (clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL) /* do goal stuff */
01840     {
01841         for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01842         {           
01843             // update velocities with constrained velocities from pinned verts
01844             if (verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED)
01845             {           
01846                 sub_v3_v3v3(id->V[i], verts[i].xconst, verts[i].xold);
01847                 // mul_v3_fl(id->V[i], clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame);
01848             }
01849         }   
01850     }
01851     
01852     while (step < tf)
01853     {   
01854         // damping velocity for artistic reasons
01855         mul_lfvectorS(id->V, id->V, clmd->sim_parms->vel_damping, numverts);
01856 
01857         // calculate forces
01858         cloth_calc_force(clmd, frame, id->F, id->X, id->V, id->dFdV, id->dFdX, effectors, step, id->M);
01859         
01860         // calculate new velocity
01861         simulate_implicit_euler(id->Vnew, id->X, id->V, id->F, id->dFdV, id->dFdX, dt, id->A, id->B, id->dV, id->S, id->z, id->olddV, id->P, id->Pinv, id->M, id->bigI);
01862         
01863         // advance positions
01864         add_lfvector_lfvectorS(id->Xnew, id->X, id->Vnew, dt, numverts);
01865         
01866         /* move pinned verts to correct position */
01867         for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01868         {   
01869             if (clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL) 
01870             {           
01871                 if (verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED)
01872                 {           
01873                     float tvect[3] = {.0,.0,.0};
01874                     sub_v3_v3v3(tvect, verts[i].xconst, verts[i].xold);
01875                     mul_fvector_S(tvect, tvect, step+dt);
01876                     VECADD(tvect, tvect, verts[i].xold);
01877                     copy_v3_v3(id->Xnew[i], tvect);
01878                 }   
01879             }
01880             
01881             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].txold, id->X[i]);
01882         }
01883 
01884         if (clmd->coll_parms->flags & CLOTH_COLLSETTINGS_FLAG_ENABLED && clmd->clothObject->bvhtree)
01885         {
01886             // collisions 
01887             // itstart();
01888             
01889             // update verts to current positions
01890             for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01891             {
01892                 copy_v3_v3(verts[i].tx, id->Xnew[i]);
01893 
01894                 sub_v3_v3v3(verts[i].tv, verts[i].tx, verts[i].txold);
01895                 copy_v3_v3(verts[i].v, verts[i].tv);
01896             }
01897 
01898             for (i=0, cv=cloth->verts; i<cloth->numverts; i++, cv++) {
01899                 copy_v3_v3(initial_cos[i], cv->tx);
01900             }
01901             
01902             // call collision function
01903             // TODO: check if "step" or "step+dt" is correct - dg
01904             do_extra_solve = cloth_bvh_objcollision(ob, clmd, step/clmd->sim_parms->timescale, dt/clmd->sim_parms->timescale);
01905                         
01906             // copy corrected positions back to simulation
01907             for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01908             {       
01909                 // correct velocity again, just to be sure we had to change it due to adaptive collisions
01910                 sub_v3_v3v3(verts[i].tv, verts[i].tx, id->X[i]);
01911             }
01912 
01913             //if (do_extra_solve)
01914             //  cloth_calc_helper_forces(ob, clmd, initial_cos, step/clmd->sim_parms->timescale, dt/clmd->sim_parms->timescale);
01915             
01916             for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01917             {       
01918 
01919                 if (do_extra_solve)
01920                 {
01921                     
01922                     if ((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL) && (verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED))
01923                         continue;
01924 
01925                     copy_v3_v3(id->Xnew[i], verts[i].tx);
01926                     copy_v3_v3(id->Vnew[i], verts[i].tv);
01927                     mul_v3_fl(id->Vnew[i], spf);
01928                 }
01929             }
01930             
01931             // X = Xnew;
01932             cp_lfvector(id->X, id->Xnew, numverts);
01933 
01934             // if there were collisions, advance the velocity from v_n+1/2 to v_n+1
01935             
01936             if (do_extra_solve)
01937             {
01938                 // V = Vnew;
01939                 cp_lfvector(id->V, id->Vnew, numverts);
01940 
01941                 // calculate 
01942                 cloth_calc_force(clmd, frame, id->F, id->X, id->V, id->dFdV, id->dFdX, effectors, step+dt, id->M);  
01943                 
01944                 simulate_implicit_euler(id->Vnew, id->X, id->V, id->F, id->dFdV, id->dFdX, dt / 2.0f, id->A, id->B, id->dV, id->S, id->z, id->olddV, id->P, id->Pinv, id->M, id->bigI);
01945             }
01946         }
01947         else
01948         {
01949             // X = Xnew;
01950             cp_lfvector(id->X, id->Xnew, numverts);
01951         }
01952         
01953         // itend();
01954         // printf("collision time: %f\n", (float)itval());
01955         
01956         // V = Vnew;
01957         cp_lfvector(id->V, id->Vnew, numverts);
01958         
01959         step += dt;
01960     }
01961 
01962     for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01963     {               
01964         if ((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL) && (verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED))
01965         {
01966             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].txold, verts[i].xconst); // TODO: test --> should be .x
01967             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].x, verts[i].xconst);
01968             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].v, id->V[i]);
01969         }
01970         else
01971         {
01972             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].txold, id->X[i]);
01973             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].x, id->X[i]);
01974             copy_v3_v3(verts[i].v, id->V[i]);
01975         }
01976     }
01977     
01978     MEM_freeN(initial_cos);
01979     
01980     return 1;
01981 }
01982 
01983 void implicit_set_positions (ClothModifierData *clmd)
01984 {
01985     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01986     ClothVertex *verts = cloth->verts;
01987     unsigned int numverts = cloth->numverts, i;
01988     Implicit_Data *id = cloth->implicit;
01989     
01990     for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01991     {               
01992         copy_v3_v3(id->X[i], verts[i].x);
01993         copy_v3_v3(id->V[i], verts[i].v);
01994     }
01995     if (G.rt > 0)
01996         printf("implicit_set_positions\n"); 
01997 }
